name: SINK (Isa P)
description:
!!! THIS IS A DEMO, ART ASSETS ARE PLACEHOLDERS/NOT FINAL !!!

SINK is a visual novel focusing on Gerard, a young vampire living in a world where humans and monsters coexist. This is made possible by a pill monsters take to suppress their bloodlust for humans, but what happens when that pill wares off?

Gerard must navigate a frat party murder mystery, his werewolf boyfriend, and a high stakes identity crisis all in one night in order to avoid a stake to the heart. 

SINK is being developed as my senior thesis at Ringling College of Art + Design, so any feedback is much appreciated!

And make sure to check out my wonderful character artist Alyssa on instagram and twitter!
